name: Tears of Tetricala
description:
Mysterious assassins, conflicted relationships, and a massive city to explore fill the world of Tears of Tetricala, a new Interactive Fiction RPG brought to you by Kaptain Viciorious Grimoire. 

During the Pandeorum Gathering on the island city of Isulstad, you play as a young noble looking for adventure, love, and so much more.  

Choose how your adventure unfolds.

[This is a first release of Chapter 1 of Tears of Tetricala with more chapters to be released soon!]

Playable on PC, Mac, and mobile, but mobile does sometimes cut the images off.

Art made with AI generators Midjourney and Nightcafe. Photos from Pixabay and Unsplash with free license. 

Game Developer: Kaptain Viciorious Grimoire

Narrative Designer, Creative Director: Konrad Bennett Hughes

For more from Konrad and KVG check out: 

https://konradhughes.com/
